data.title: Ms. Laura Lee Atkinson | People
data.text: While attending the University of Nebraska in Lincoln, Laura Lee began her study of the Suzuki method with Marilyn O’Boyle and Francia Birdsall Mann. She has also trained with Alice Joy Lewis and James Hutchins. Laura Lee became a member of the Lincoln Suzuki Talent Education, Inc. group in 1985. She maintained the Atkinson Music Studio, teaching Suzuki and traditional violin and viola for more than 30 years. She has taught at workshops and clinics in Nebraska, lowa, Kansas and Missouri. All 4 of Laura Lee’s children began Suzuki lessons at the age of 3. She recently relocated to Aiken SC with her husband Randall and youngest daughter Alea.
